item.title: Flutter Part 1: Install
item.description:
Install (macOS)

  1. Download Flutter SDK and unzip
  2. Add path to .zshrc
export PATH="$PATH:[PATH_OF_DIRECTORY]/flutter/bin"
  1. Pre-download tools
flutter precache

esther

Make sure that you unzip the flutter folder into the right directory. If you'd like to move the flutter folder after ran flutter, you might see the same error as mine. ðŸ™ˆ
